text: 9:11-12 Ua Me Ini 12:46; Jon 19:36Egh me namba 2ɨn iakɨnimɨn, an namba 14ɨn aruemɨn, an guaratɨzimɨn isam damuam. Me God Israelia Gitazir Dughiam Gɨnɨghnɨghamin Isar kamɨn araziba bar dar gɨn mangɨ. Me isam damusɨ, sipsipɨn asɨzir tuzim, ko yis puvatɨzir bret, ko zuravarir mɨsoziba sara damɨ. Egh me asɨzir tuzitam ateghtɨ a ikɨ mangɨ amɨmzaraghan otivan markɨ. Egh asɨzir kamɨn agharitam apɨran markɨ.
